alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 15 at 4:40AM AKST until November 17 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range, Upper Koyukuk Valley and Central Interior. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 3 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snowfall amounts west of a line from the Dalton Highway south to Tanana with a sharp west to east gradient expected around Tanana.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley
